message_history.content:
A conversation between User and Assistant. The user asks a question, and the Assistant answers it. The Assistant analyzes the given question and information in the mind, retains important relevant information, calls a search engine to find necessary information, accesses web pages with certain urls, and provides the user with the answer. The Assistant conducts search by <search> query </search>, access certain url by <access> url </access>, and the top search results and url page will be returned between <information> and </information>.  The reasoning processes are enclosed within <think> </think>. Finally, the Assistant provides answer inside <answer> and </answer>, i.e. <answer> answer here </answer>. If there are multiple queries, ensure all answers are enclosed within <answer> </answer>, seperated with comma. 

Note: the question is a valid question and you should try to find a correct answer. 

User: 我要写一篇关于旅游饭店的论文，现在需要整理截止2025年7月（包含2025年7月）北京的五星级饭店相关信息，包括星级饭店名称、所在区、星级标牌号，以及具体地址，请以国家旅游局发布的“五星级旅游酒店”名单为准。请以一整个Markdown表格的格式输出整理后的数据，不要拆分成多个markdown表格，每个单元格都需要按列名要求输出，不得无故省略，输出采用中文。
表格中的列名依次为：饭店名称、市区、星级标牌号、具体地址。不要问我任何问题，只需输出结果，输出格式为```markdown{数据内容}```

Assistant: 
<think>

To find the information about 5-star hotels in Beijing up to July 2025, I'll search through reliable sources such as the official website of the China National Tourism Administration (CNTA). </think>
<search> 截止2025年7月（包含2025年7月）北京的五星级饭店相关信息，包括星级饭店名称、所在区、星级标牌号，以及具体地址，请以国家旅游局发布的“五星级旅游酒店”名单为准。 </search>

Search query: 截止2025年7月（包含2025年7月）北京的五星级饭店相关信息，包括星级饭店名称、所在区、星级标牌号，以及具体地址，请以国家旅游局发布的“五星级旅游酒店”名单为准。
Result: [Doc 1](https://zwfw.mct.gov.cn/wycx/wxjlyfd/):
五星级旅游饭店 酒店名称, 所属地区. 王府饭店, 北京. 北京华侨大厦, 北京. 北京天伦王朝饭店, 北京市. 北京市长城饭店, 北京市. 北京希尔顿酒店, 北京. 北京嘉里大酒店, 北京.

[Doc 2](http://www.ctha.com.cn/detail-23-52-3941.html):
全国旅游星级饭店评定委员会公告2025年第23号 全国旅游星级饭店评定委员会关于批准. 五星级旅游饭店的公告. 2025年第23号. 经全国旅游星级饭店评定委员会研究决定，批准四家饭店为五星级旅游饭店。具体名单如下： ...

[Doc 3](https://www.futai666.com/detail-2-52-3809.html):
全国旅游星级饭店评定委员会公告2025年第7号 全国旅游星级饭店评定委员会关于批准. 五星级旅游饭店的公告. 2025年第7号. 经全国旅游星级饭店评定委员会研究决定，批准2家饭店为五星级旅游饭店。具体名单如下：.

[Doc 4](https://mctgov.org/minglu.html):
饭店名录_中国星级饭店查询网 三星级, 北京重庆饭店, 1130058, 朝阳区光熙门北里15号, 010-64228888. 46, 朝阳 ... 五星级, 北京京都信苑饭店, 1150017. 219, 海淀区, 五星级, 北京新世纪饭店, 1150018.

[Doc 5](https://zwfw.mct.gov.cn/wycx/wxjlyfd/xq/?uuid=55407):
五星级旅游饭店查询 地址：东城区朝阳门北大街10号. ICP备案：京ICP备18030242号-1. 电话：010-59881114. 邮编：100020. 网站标识码bm23000001. 京公网安备11040202440050号 · 网站建设：北京分形 ...

新华每日电讯-微报纸-2026年01月14日 本报记者孙清清翟濯 强大国内市场是中国式现代化的战略依托。“十五五”规划建议对“建设强大国内市场，加快构建新发展格局”作出部署，明确提出要“坚决破除阻碍全国统一大 ...

[Doc 5](https://www.cnhotelnews.com/nr.jsp?groupId=9):
酒店新闻 - 中国酒店传媒网 2025年9月23日，在万众期待中，首旅酒店的建国品牌全新力作——建国饭店·环球店于北京通州区度假区盛大启幕。通州区文旅、首旅集团、北京首旅城市副中心投资有限公司、北京首旅 ...
I need to filter out the information specifically for Beijing's 5-star hotels and their addresses. I'll look into more detailed sources to find the star plaque numbers as well. </

think>
<search> beijing 5 star hotel star plaque number</search>

Search query: beijing 5 star hotel star plaque number
Result: [Doc 1](https://www.peninsula.com/en/beijing/5-star-luxury-hotel-wangfujing):
5 Star Hotel Beijing, China - Luxury Hotel | The Peninsula Beijing The Peninsula Beijing is the first all-suite hotel in the heart of China's capital ... Phone Number: +86 10 8516 2888 Ext 6757 Email Address: huangtingpbj ...

[Doc 2](https://www.beijing-hotels-china.com/en/5-stars/):
5 star hotels in Beijing 214 results found ; The Great Wall Hotel Beijing. 10 North Dong San Huan Road, Chaoyang District, Beijing, China · US$ 54 ; Four Seasons Hotel Beijing.

[Doc 3](https://www.hyatt.com/grand-hyatt/en-US/beigh-grand-hyatt-beijing):
5-Star Luxury Hotel in Beijing | Grand Hyatt Beijing Grand Hyatt Beijing is a five-star luxury hotel Located on Wangfujing ... Phone NumberTel:+86 10 8518 1234 · 4.5 (570 Reviews). Grand Hyatt Beijing. Map.

[Doc 4](https://www.fivestaralliance.com/luxury-hotels/112/asia/china):
The 171 Best Luxury China Hotels | Five Star Alliance This page only shows the first 35 hotels, so not all 171 are displayed. Please click "View More Hotels" at the bottom of this list.

[Doc 5](https://www.ritzcarlton.com/en/hotels/bjsrz-the-ritz-carlton-beijing/overview/):
The Ritz-Carlton, Beijing | Luxury Hotel in Beijing Experience five-star amenities at The Ritz-Carlton, Beijing and indulge in luxury accomodations. Book your stay today.
